detectors.description: Crowdsale.fallback() () uses arbitrary from in transferFrom: ! tokenReward.transferFrom(beneficiary,msg.sender,numTokens) ()
Modifier Crowdsale.afterDeadline() () does not always execute _; or revert
detectors.markdown: Modifier [Crowdsale.afterDeadline()]() does not always execute _; or revert

detectors.description:
Reentrancy in Crowdsale.fallback() ():
	External calls:
	- ! tokenReward.transferFrom(beneficiary,msg.sender,numTokens) ()
	Event emitted after the call(s):
	- FundTransfer(msg.sender,amount,true) ()
detectors.markdown:
Reentrancy in [Crowdsale.fallback()]():
	External calls:
	- [! tokenReward.transferFrom(beneficiary,msg.sender,numTokens)]()
	Event emitted after the call(s):
	- [FundTransfer(msg.sender,amount,true)]()

elements.name: crowdsaleClosed || now < start || tokensSold + numTokens > maxGoal

detectors.description: Contract token () is not in CapWords

Reentrancy in Crowdsale.safeWithdrawal() ():
	External calls:
	- msg.sender.send(amount) ()
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- fundingGoalReached = false ()
	Event emitted after the call(s):
	- FundTransfer(msg.sender,amount,false) ()
detectors.markdown:
Reentrancy in [Crowdsale.safeWithdrawal()]():
	External calls:
	- [msg.sender.send(amount)]()
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- [fundingGoalReached = false]()
	Event emitted after the call(s):
	- [FundTransfer(msg.sender,amount,false)]()

detectors.description:
Reentrancy in Crowdsale.safeWithdrawal() ():
	External calls:
	- msg.sender.send(amount) ()
	- beneficiary.send(amountRaised) ()
	Event emitted after the call(s):
	- FundTransfer(beneficiary,amountRaised,false) ()
detectors.markdown:
Reentrancy in [Crowdsale.safeWithdrawal()]():
	External calls:
	- [msg.sender.send(amount)]()
	- [beneficiary.send(amountRaised)]()
	Event emitted after the call(s):
	- [FundTransfer(beneficiary,amountRaised,false)]()
